programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: A Killer Slips Away
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E10, The loving aunt of a close-knit family is stabbed to death in her home. It takes two decades for detectives to discover that a key witness was an imposter--and caused the case to go cold.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Sweethearts, Silenced
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E04, A killer authors a book about his con-man past that becomes the key to solving a 29-year-old cold case of two high school sweethearts--and three other cold case murders--leading police to believe he could be the Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.
Film Crew: Hollywood After Dark, 20070710070000 +0000, The Film Crew gives a commentary track to Walk the Angry Beach, aka Hollywood After Dark, featuring Rue McClanahan as a stripper.

MST3K: The Final Sacrifice, 19980725000000 +0000, With the help of a mysterious map and a truck-driving drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy McGreggor sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta in search of the answers behind the hooded cult responsible for his father's grisly murder.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).
MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger, 20220722000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.
MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru, 20220902000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

MST3K: Women Of The Prehistoric Planet, 19900220000000 +0000, Our intrepid hosts are trapped between Isaac Asimov's Literary Doomsday Device and Robert Ito from Quincy M.E. (1976) in a fur caveman outfit.

programme.title: Horrors of Spider Island
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E11, A group of showgirls washes up on a deserted island after their plane crashes. Soon they discover the island is home to a large, radioactive spider.

programme.title: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained, S04E08, While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

Cedar Cove, 20130720000000 +0000, When Olivia Lockhart (Andie MacDowell) is given the opportunity for a federal judgeship, she must face the challenging decision, and while tempting, she risks losing her new romance and leaving the town and people she loves most.

August Creek, 20170807000000 +0000, Erica (Courtney Ford) left her Iowa hometown after she lost her soldier husband, but three years later she returns for her sister's wedding and has to face the love she left behind.

Blind Spot, 19930502000000 +0000, A woman running for the Senate is jolted by a family tragedy which threatens to become a career ending scandal. Stars Joanne Woodward and Laura Linney. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Breathing Lessons, 19940206000000 +0000, A mature couple, one grounded and realistic and the other flighty and inspired, get lost on a trip that becomes a crazy adventure of twists, turns, shocks and surprises rekindling memories, love and life.

programme.title: Photographs and Memories
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abby sends her girls off to their first day at a new school.

programme.title: It's Always Nashville
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Trace hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Buried Treasures
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Nell discovers a treasure map that Bree made as a teen.

programme.title: Grand Openings
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. As the nightclub opening nears, Trace spends late nights practicing.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Mark offers Trace and his band a worldwide tour deal.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E05, After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the citys technological infrastructure.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKays sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michaels abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E17, Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctors switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliances secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Fragile Balance
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E03, A 15-year-old infiltrates the SGC with the startling news that he is Colonel Jack O'Neill, having mysteriously reverse aged 30 years overnight. Possessing O'Neill's knowledge, exact DNA and, above all, his attitude, can he really be O'Neill?

programme.title: Orpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E04, Through the help of Daniel, Teal'c visualizes that Rya'c and Bra'tac are being held prisoner in a Goa'uld death camp. With SG-1's help, Teal'c sets out to rescue his son and his mentor, but can he overcome his fears in time?

programme.title: Revisions
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E05, Six thousand light-years away, O'Neill and the SG-1 team discover a devastated universe where the inhabitants must live in a protective dome. They survive through an all-controlling computer system called the Link. But is it a savior, or a curse?

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E06, SG-1 finds a crashed spaceship containing hundreds of people in a cryogenic sleep. Stunned by an unseen weapon, the team is struck unconscious and, upon awakening, discovers that several of the frozen personalities now inhabit Daniel's body!

programme.title: Enemy Mine
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E07, An SGC Naquadah mining operation is attacked by a native tribe of Unas. SG-1 is sent to protect the miners and discovers that the Unas are guarding land they believe is sacred. Instead of eradicating the Unas, Daniel races to negotiate with them.

programme.title: Space Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E08, The Serakkin Warrick proposes to share his planet's technology with Earth in exchange for Carter helping him win a space race. Carter eagerly agrees and copilots the craft through a perilous obstacle course; but the race isn't without risks.
